attributes.action: OFSTED - ABOLISH this unnecessary NDPB - Put the finance back into schools
attributes.additional_details:
Abolish OFSTED which currently costs £170,000,000, replace is with a self evaluative system.

The anual cost of OFSTED is the equivalent of 8,000 new teachers or 16,000 support staff.

OFSTED stifles teaching creativity by excessive unnecessary regulation and control, ultimately affecting school morale and your childs education.

We should abolish it NOW and replace it with a better less costly system, putting control back into individual schools.

11 senior members of OFSTED collect up to £1,500,000 in salaries each year.

Read the accounts:
http://www.ofsted.gov.uk/resources/ofsted-annual-report-and-accounts-2011-12
